abstract: A string to display in response to an alert panel help anchor button being pressed.
overview:
## Discussion

The object in the user info dictionary for the key [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHelpAnchorErrorKey]. If the user info dictionary doesn’t contain a value for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHelpAnchorErrorKey], this property is `nil`.

If this property is non-`nil` for an error being presented by [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSAlert/init(error:)], the alert panel will include a help anchor button that can display this string.

# helpAnchor

**Instance Property**

A string to display in response to an alert panel help anchor button being pressed.

## Declaration

```swift
var helpAnchor: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

The object in the user info dictionary for the key [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHelpAnchorErrorKey]. If the user info dictionary doesn’t contain a value for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSHelpAnchorErrorKey], this property is `nil`.

If this property is non-`nil` for an error being presented by [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AppKit/NSAlert/init(error:)], the alert panel will include a help anchor button that can display this string.
title: helpAnchor
